Test Name: Broad Range Bacterial PCR and Sequencing
Specimen Type: Clinical specimens such as blood, tissue, cerebrospinal fluid, or swabs
Purpose: To detect and identify bacterial pathogens in clinical samples via broad-range PCR amplification and DNA sequencing.
Container: Sterile, leak-proof container appropriate for the specimen type
Equipment: Thermal cycler, DNA sequencing instrument, agarose gel electrophoresis system, microcentrifuge, pipettes
